== Main Inclusion Report for `wavpack` ==

# ''Availability:'' Available in universe/unstable/testing, Arch: any
# ''Rationale:'' gst-plugins0.8 has optional support for wavpack. it enables an wavpack decoding plugin for gstreamer. wavpack is a completely open audio compression format providing lossless, high-quality lossy and a hybrid compression mode. there are no patents known that wavpack infringes
# ''Security:'' 
** No CANs
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** no bugs in Debian BTS <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:wavpack]]</nowiki>, no upstream BTS but upstream author is really responsive by mail. there are no known outstanding bugs atm
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS.
 0. ''Dependencies:'' 
** all dependencies are in main (libc, libncurses and docbook-{xsl,xml}, xsltproc)
